# Hexa Sort - Free Online Puzzle Game

> Hexa Sort is a free online color-sorting puzzle game where you stack and match hexagonal tiles. Play instantly without download, directly in your web browser.

Hexa Sort is a fun and strategic puzzle game that challenges players to sort colorful hexagonal tiles into their correct stacks. As you progress, you can unlock exciting levels, face harder challenges, and test your puzzle-solving skills.

## Level Guides

Find walkthroughs, tips, and cheats for all Hexa Sort levels.

- [Play Level 20](https://www.perfecttidyhub.com/levels/20) - This challenge requires players to carefully sort and stack colorful hexagonal tiles to achieve merges and clear the board. The level features a complex pattern design, testing overall planning and color-matching strategy. Video walkthroughs show that it can be cleared without using power-ups.

- [Play Level 21](https://www.perfecttidyhub.com/levels/21) - The number of color blocks increases, making the merging routes more challenging. Multiple merges are required to trigger eliminations, and players must avoid filling the board to prevent failure. Strategic use of the swap and hammer power-ups is recommended. Video guides also demonstrate no-boost solutions.

- [Play Level 28](https://www.perfecttidyhub.com/levels/28) - This level emphasizes color arrangement and multi-layer stacking. No-boost runs highlight the need for precise timing and placement. It feels like a mini-puzzle that requires careful move planning. Complex stacking situations raise the challenge.

- [Play Level 40](https://www.perfecttidyhub.com/levels/40) - Players must complete a target number of merges within limited space. Both color sorting and spatial management are essential. Video demos emphasize stacking order and early layout planning to reduce obstacles. This is an advanced level with high attention to detail.

- [Play Level 49](https://www.perfecttidyhub.com/levels/49) - The target tile count and stack depth increase further. Block mixing and restrictions force careful positioning. Frequent use of hammer and swap power-ups is common. Community tips stress patience and proper sequencing.

- [Play Level 57](https://www.perfecttidyhub.com/levels/57) - A multi-element puzzle requiring both color and positional accuracy. Power-ups are often needed to break deadlocks and switch positions effectively. This complex stage demands mastery of merging techniques and time management.

- [Play Level 75](https://www.perfecttidyhub.com/levels/75) - A high-difficulty stage with many block types and larger quantities. Careful multi-step planning is needed to merge efficiently. Smart use of power-ups and situational analysis is critical. Demonstration videos showcase refined techniques and strategies.

- Cross-Platform - Play online in browser or via iOS & Android apps

## Technical Information

- Game Type: Puzzle / Sorting
- Platform: Web browsers, iOS, Android
- Device Requirements: 2GB RAM, updated browser
- Game Mode: Single player
- Languages: English

### About The Game

Hexa Sort is an engaging puzzle game where players sort hexagonal tiles into matching stacks. With hundreds of handcrafted levels, smooth 3D animations, and brain-teasing gameplay, Hexa Sort is both fun and challenging. Play directly in your browser or on mobile devices - no downloads needed!
